Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Set in Africa

Bingo Square [15]

Book must either be set in Africa like Rosewater by Tade Thompson or in an analogous setting that is based on a real-world African setting like Raybearer by Jordan Ifueko. HARD MODE: Author is of African heritage.

Title Author Hard Mode
A Song of Wraiths and Ruin Roseanne A. Brown
A Taste Of Honey Kai Ashante Wilson
Akata Witch Nnedi Okorafor
Binti Nnedi Okorafor
Black Leopard, Red Wolf Marlon James
Children of Blood and Bone Tomi Adeyemi
David Mogo, Godhunter Suyi Davies Okungbowa
Dead Djinn Universe P. Djèlí Clark
Dragon Jousters Mercedes Lackey
Empire of Gold S.A. Chakraborty
Equatorial Assignment David G Maillu
Forest of a Thousand Daemons D.O. Fagunwa
Imaro Charles Saunders
